Package com.intellij.openapi.fileEditor

Interface FileDocumentManagerListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.EventListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EncodingManager, FileDocumentManagerAdapter, LineEndingsManager, TrailingSpacesStripper

    public interface FileDocumentManagerListener
extends java.util.EventListener
    See Also:
    AppTopics.FILE_DOCUMENT_SYNC

    • Field Detail

      • EP_NAME

        static final ExtensionPointName<FileDocumentManagerListener> EP_NAME
        There is a possible case that callback that listens for the events implied by the current interface needs to modify document contents (e.g. strip trailing spaces before saving a document). It's too dangerous to do that from message bus callback because that may cause unexpected 'nested modification' (see IDEA-71701 for more details).

        That's why this interface is exposed via extension point as well - it's possible to modify document content from the extension callback.

    • Method Detail

      • beforeAllDocumentsSaving

        default void beforeAllDocumentsSaving()
        Fired before processing FileDocumentManager.saveAllDocuments(). Can be used by plugins which need to perform additional save operations when documents, rather than settings, are saved.

      • beforeDocumentSaving

        default void beforeDocumentSaving(Document document)
        NOTE: Vetoing facility is deprecated in this listener implement FileDocumentSynchronizationVetoer instead.

      • beforeFileContentReload

        default void beforeFileContentReload(VirtualFile file,
                                     Document document)
        NOTE: Vetoing facility is deprecated in this listener implement FileDocumentSynchronizationVetoer instead.
